description: This file defines an interface for a 'Butler' component within the WPEFramework, including nested notification interface and methods for managing IValuePoint elements and data source operations.

classes.name: IButler
classes.description: Interface for a Butler component providing methods to access value points, register/unregister notifications, and manage data branches.

classes.name: IButler::INotification
classes.description: Nested interface for receiving notifications about added, removed, updated, or metadata-changed value points.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Register a notification sink for receiving updates about value point changes.

methods.name: Element
methods.description: Retrieve a value point by name or ID.

methods.name: Source
methods.description: Get the source string for a specific module.

methods.name: Branch
methods.description: Get the branch (likely a data path) for a given string path.

methods.name: Link
methods.description: Create a link between a path and an ID.

methods.name: Move
methods.description: Rename or move a value point to a new name.

methods.name: Delete
methods.description: Remove a value point at a given path.

methods.name: Orphans
methods.description: Obtain an iterator over orphaned value points within a module.

ctags.name: IButler
ctags.pattern: /^		struct EXTERNAL IButler : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: INotification
ctags.pattern: /^			struct EXTERNAL INotification : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
